ArmPlan.description: The plan object in Azure Resource Manager, represents a marketplace plan.

privateEndpoint.description: PrivateEndpoint of a remote private endpoint connection

ipAddresses.description: Private IPAddresses mapped to the remote private endpoint

ResponseMessageEnvelope[RemotePrivateEnd.description: Message envelope that contains the common Azure resource manager properties and the resource provider specific content.

location.description: Geographical region resource belongs to e.g. SouthCentralUS, SouthEastAsia.

zones.description: Logical Availability Zones the service is hosted in

defaultHostname.description: The default autogenerated hostname for the static site.

repositoryUrl.description: URL for the repository of the static site.

branch.description: The target branch in the repository.

customDomains.description: The custom domains associated with this static site.

repositoryToken.description: A user's github repository token. This is used to setup the Github Actions workflow file and API secrets.

buildProperties.description: Build properties to configure on the repository.

stagingEnvironmentPolicy.description: State indicating whether staging environments are allowed or not allowed for a static web app.

allowConfigFileUpdates.description: false if config file is locked for this static web app; otherwise, true.

templateProperties.description: Template options for generating a new repository.

contentDistributionEndpoint.description: The content distribution endpoint for the static site.

keyVaultReferenceIdentity.description: Identity to use for Key Vault Reference authentication.

userProvidedFunctionApps.description: User provided function apps registered with the static site

provider.description: The provider that submitted the last deployment to the primary environment of the static site.

apiLocation.description: The path to the api code within the repository.
